ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_gcdabs1 | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` M ) gcd N ) = ( M gcd N ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` M ) gcd N ) = ( M gcd N ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zabscl | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( abs ` M ) e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | #P_gcdcom | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ ( abs ` M ) e. ZZ ) -> ( N gcd ( abs ` M ) ) = ( ( abs ` M ) gcd N ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( N gcd ( abs ` M ) ) = ( ( abs ` M ) gcd N ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_gcdcom | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( N gcd M ) = ( M gcd N ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 5, 6 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( N gcd ( abs ` M ) ) = ( N gcd M ) ) |
